props.title: Edit Profile
props.description: Make changes to your profile here. Click save when you're done.
props.dialogClassName: fixed z-50 w-[95vw] max-w-md rounded-lg p-4 md:w-full top-1/2 left-1/2 -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75
props.saveButtonClassName: inline-flex select-none justify-center rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium bg-purple-600 text-white hover:bg-purple-700 dark:bg-purple-700 dark:text-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-purple-600 border border-transparent focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75
props.closeButtonClassName: absolute top-3.5 right-3.5 inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full p-1 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75

fields.label: First Name
fields.inputClassName: mt-1 block w-full rounded-md text-sm text-gray-700 placeholder:text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 dark:placeholder:text-gray-600 border border-gray-400 focus-visible:border-transparent dark:border-gray-700 dark:bg-gray-800 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75

props.contentClassName: radix-side-top:animate-slide-up radix-side-bottom:animate-slide-down w-48 rounded-lg px-1.5 py-1 shadow-md md:w-56 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800
props.subcontentClassName: origin-radix-dropdown-menu radix-side-right:animate-scale-in w-full rounded-md px-1 py-1 text-xs shadow-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-800

items.label: New Item
items.itemClassName: flex cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-md px-2 py-2 text-xs outline-none text-gray-400 focus:bg-gray-50 dark:text-gray-500 dark:focus:bg-gray-900

items.iconClassName: ml-2 h-5 w-5 shrink-0 text-gray-700 ease-in-out dark:text-gray-400
ml-2 h-5 w-5 shrink-0 text-gray-700 ease-in-out dark:text-gray-400

props.menuClassName: radix-side-top:animate-slide-up radix-side-bottom:animate-slide-down w-48 rounded-lg px-1.5 py-1 shadow-md md:w-56 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800

items.label: New File
items.itemClassName: flex cursor-default select-none items-center rounded-md px-2 py-2 text-xs outline-none text-gray-400 focus:bg-gray-50 dark:text-gray-500 dark:focus:bg-gray-900

props.subContentClassName: origin-radix-context-menu radix-side-right:animate-scale-in w-full rounded-md px-1 py-1 text-xs shadow-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-800

styles.list: flex flex-row rounded-lg bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 p-2 space-x-2
styles.trigger: px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-md hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-900 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring
styles.link: px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-md hover:bg-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-900 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-100
styles.content: absolute w-auto top-0 left-0 rounded-lg radix-motion-from-start:animate-enter-from-left radix-motion-from-end:animate-enter-from-right radix-motion-to-start:animate-exit-to-left radix-motion-to-end:animate-exit-to-right
styles.viewportWrapper: absolute flex justify-center w-[140%] left-[-20%] top-[100%]
styles.viewport: relative mt-2 shadow-lg rounded-md bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 overflow-hidden w-radix-navigation-menu-viewport h-radix-navigation-menu-viewport radix-state-open:animate-scale-in-content radix-state-closed:animate-scale-out-content origin-[top_center] transition-[width_height] duration-300 ease-[ease]
styles.indicator: z-10 top-[100%] flex items-end justify-center h-2 overflow-hidden radix-state-visible:animate-fade-in radix-state-hidden:animate-fade-out transition-[width_transform] duration-[250ms] ease-[ease]

props.rootClassName: flex space-x-4 rounded-lg bg-white px-2.5 py-2 dark:bg-gray-800
props.itemClassName: radix-state-on:bg-gray-50 dark:radix-state-on:bg-gray-900 bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 border-y px-2.5 py-2 first:rounded-l-md first:border-x last:rounded-r-md last:border-x border-gray-200 radix-state-on:border-transparent dark:border-gray-600 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75

props.label: Accept terms and conditions
props.checkboxClassName: flex h-5 w-5 items-center justify-center rounded radix-state-checked:bg-purple-600 radix-state-unchecked:bg-gray-100 dark:radix-state-unchecked:bg-gray-900 focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75
props.labelClassName: ml-3 select-none text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-gray-100

items.title: Example Playlist
items.className: ml-12 flex select-none items-center justify-between rounded-md px-4 py-2 text-left text-sm font-medium bg-white text-gray-900 hover:bg-gray-50 dark:bg-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-900

props.rootClassName: relative flex h-5 w-64 touch-none items-center
props.trackClassName: relative h-1 w-full grow rounded-full bg-white dark:bg-gray-800
props.thumbClassName: block h-5 w-5 rounded-full bg-purple-600 dark:bg-white focus:outline-none focus-visible:ring focus-visible:ring-purple-500 focus-visible:ring-opacity-75
